title: Delhi to Rishikesh Adventure Escape
overview: Get your adrenaline pumping with river rafting and find peace with Ganga Aarti in the Yoga Capital of the World.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Camping
itinerary.desc: Drive from Delhi, check-in at riverside camp, evening bonfire.

itinerary.title: Rafting & Sightseeing
itinerary.desc: 16km river rafting, visit Laxman Jhula and Ram Jhula.

itinerary.title: Yoga & Departure
itinerary.desc: Morning yoga session, breakfast, and drive back to Delhi.
